titles.title: Honoring and recognizing the 40th anniversary of Cheyney University's historic, momentous, and epic 1978 NCAA Division II Basketball Championship win.
Honoring and recognizing the 40th anniversary of Cheyney University's historic, momentous, and epic 1978 NCAA Division II Basketball Championship win.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Recognizes Cheyney University in Pennsylvania on the 40th anniversary of their 1978 NCAA Division II Basketball Championship win.
